title: lf gold/plat support to carry me
body:
I main adc, new account. Bronze 5 - gold 5 so far. 

Old acc was plat 2+, add me and we can duo

replies.body:
Shoot me an add if you like.
I'm a G3 support. Super friendly, mechanically "urgh", but I have a decent understand about how secure objectives.  
Highly prefer Leona, but also Karma, Morgana, Janna and well willing to learn or give any champ a go.

u cant play with gold or platinum people
ur 2 low level

From the post I've understood he's climbed from BV -> GV on this account. 
Thus he can play with people from SV - PV.
